import React from 'react'; import userData from '../json/user.json' import styles from './Profile.css' const Profile = () => { const { username, tag, location, avatar, stats } = userData; return (

{username}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
); }; export default Profile;
